text: The vehicles carrying inflammable fluids usually have metallic chains touching the ground:

options.a: To protect tyres from catching dirt from ground
options.d: To conduct excess charge due to air friction to ground and prevent sparking

hint: Static charge is developed due to air friction. This can result in combustion. So, metallic chains is used to discharge excess charge. LEVEL-2 56. Estimate the total negative charge in 1g of water. Given that Avogadro number = 6.02 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>23</mn></msup></math> and molecular weight of water = 18. a) 6.25 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup></math>Cb) 5.35 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup></math>C c) 1.76 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup></math>Cd) 1.25 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup></math>C Key: b
